## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.



```{r}
a <- c("1","b","TRUE")
a

a[[5]] <- "7" # 元素不存在
a
```

```{r}
b <- list(
  元素1=1,
  元素2="Hello",
  元素3=TRUE
)

b[[3]] <- FALSE
b[[5]] <- 7
b[["新元素"]] <- 8
```

```{r}
library(readr)
exData3 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/exData3.csv",
                    col_types = cols(
                      匯率 = col_number(),
                      期間 = col_character()))
```

```{r}
library(lubridate)
exData3$期間 <- ymd(exData3$期間)
class(exData3)
```

```{r}
exData3[["isAsiaCrisis"]] <- (exData3$期間 >= "1997-06-01" & exData3$期間 <= "1998-12-01")
exData3
```

```{r}
time1 <- ymd("1997-06-01")
time1
time2 <- ymd("1998-12-01")
time2
isAsiaCrisis <- exData3[[1]] <= time2 & exData3[[1]] >= time1
class(isAsiaCrisis)
isAsiaCrisis
```

```{r}
logiAsiaCrisis <- exData3$isAsiaCrisis
exData3[logiAsiaCrisis, ]
#or
exData3[exData3$isAsiaCrisis==T ,]
```

```{r}
library(readr)
transcriptDataFinal <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/transcriptDataFinal.csv")
```

```{r}
function1 <- function(x,.alpha){
  value <- x+.alpha
  return(value)
}
class(function1)
```

```{r}
utility_cobb_douglass <- function(x,y,.alpha,.beta){
  utilValue <- x^.alpha*y^.beta # 程序產生output值
  return(utilValue) # 傳回output值
}
class(utility_cobb_douglass)
utility_cobb_douglass(1,2,0.5,0.8)
```
